tool_description:
Convert any HTML documents to high-fidelity PDF in one single POST request.

The service is focused to help developers set up the conversion quickly and focus on their core problem.
Advanced features are available, like watermarking and encryption, and you can see all the available options on the documentation page.
name: PDFShift
title: PDFShift

api_list.name: Credits_GET
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pdfshift-v2.p.rapidapi.com/credits/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pdfshift-v2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pdfshift-v2.p.rapidapi.com/credits/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
